DOC.brief_summary: Proposed randomized , control , modify Latin square parallel design study two treatment arm examine walnut consumption effect diet quality , body composition , marker cardiovascular risk adult risk diabetes 6-month period . A modified crossover design ( Latin square ) 27-29 allow pair unpaired analysis .
DOC.brief_title: Walnut Ingestion Adults Risk Diabetes : Effects Body Composition , Diet Quality , Cardiac Risk Measures
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aims - To determine effect walnut-included diet ( without caloric intake adjustment ) versus walnut-excluded diet diet quality adult risk diabetes . Specifically , show walnut-included diet , compare walnut-excluded diet improve overall diet quality measure Alternative Healthy Eating Index adult risk diabetes . - To determine effect walnut-included diet ( without caloric intake adjustment ) versus walnut-excluded diet body composition adult risk diabetes . Specifically , show walnut-included diet , compare walnut-excluded diet 6 month improve body fat percentage adult risk diabetes . - To assess effect walnut-included diet ( without caloric intake adjustment ) 6-month period endothelial function , lipid panel level , fast glucose level , fast insulin level anthropometric measure adult risk diabetes . Specifically , show clinically meaningful improvement endothelial function , lipid panel , fast blood glucose , hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) , anthropometric measure endothelial function inclusion walnuts diet adult risk diabetes . Hypotheses - A walnut-included diet without dietary counseling adjust caloric intake improve diet quality adult risk diabetes . - A walnut-included diet 6 month without dietary counseling adjust caloric intake improve body composition adult risk diabetes . - A walnut-included diet without dietary counseling adjust caloric intake improve lipid panel , fast blood glucose , hemoglobin A1c , endothelial function anthropometric measure adult risk diabetes . - Controlling calorie intake keep constant addition walnut diet enhance beneficial effect walnut ingestion diet quality , body composition , vascular function .
DOC.criteria: Male female age 2575 year ; Nonsmoker ; High risk diabetes , define meeting least one criterion list : . Overweight increase waist circumference ; b.Prediabetes : fast blood glucose > 100mg/dL < 126mg/dL HbA1C 5.76.4 % c. Metabolic syndrome , i.e . meet three five follow criterion : i.Blood pressure > 130/85 mmHg currently take antihypertensive medication ; ii . Fasting plasma glucose ( FPG ) > 100 mg/dL ( 6.1 mmol/L ) ; iii.Serum triglyceride level ( TG ) > 150 mg/dL ( 1.69 mmol/L ) ; iv . Highdensity lipoprotein ( HDL ) cholesterol < 40 mg/dL ( 1.04 mmol/L ) men , < 50 mg/dL ( 1.29 mmol/L ) woman ; v. Overweight ( BMI ≥25kg/m² ) waist circumference 40 inch ( 102 cm ) men 35 inch ( 88 cm ) woman . Exclusion Criteria Allergy walnuts nut ; Anticipated inability complete study protocol reason ; Current eat disorder ; Restricted diet choice ( i.e. , vegetarian , vegan ) ; Receiving pharmacotherapy obesity , include appetite suppressant Unstable use lipidlowering , antihypertensive medication aspirin ( i.e . dose change three month prior enrollment ) unwilling refrain take medication 12 hour prior endothelial function scanning ; Regular use high dos vitamin E ( > 400IU/day ) vitamin C ( > 500mg/day ) ; fish oil , flaxseed oil , omega3 fatty acid fiber supplement unless well discontinue supplementation study duration . Use insulin , glucosesensitizing medication , vasoactive medication ( include glucocorticoid , antineoplastic agent , psychoactive agent , bronchodilator ) ; Diagnosed diabetes ; Diagnosed sleep apnea ; Established cardiovascular disease ( include symptomatic coronary artery disease ( CAD ) , myocardial infarction , peripheral vascular disease , congestive heart failure , carotid stenosis ) ; Coagulopathy , know bleed diathesis , history clinically significant hemorrhage ; current use warfarin ; Regular exercise define participation moderateintensity exercise > 150 minutes/week . Substance abuse ( chronic alcoholism , chemical dependency ) Any unstable medical condition would limit ability subject participate fully trial ( e.g. , cancer , AIDS , tuberculosis , psychotic disorder ) Women get DepoProvera shot Women pregnant lactate Women currently hormone replacement therapy Substance abuse ( chronic alcoholism , chemical dependency ) Any unstable medical condition would limit ability subject participate fully trial ( e.g. , cancer , AIDS , tuberculosis , psychotic disorder )
